name: @ai-on-browser/data-analysis-models
description: Data analysis model package without any dependencies

scripts.test:lib: npm run create-entry && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx jest --testMatch '**/lib/**/?(*.)+(spec|test).[jt]s?(x)' --coverage --reporters default ./tests/custom-reporter.js --maxWorkers=100%
scripts.types: npm run create-entry && find lib -name \*.d.ts -delete && tsc ./lib/**.js ./lib/**/*.js --declaration --allowJs --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.document: npm run create-entry && documentation build lib -f html --github -o docs
scripts.build:gh-pages: npm run document && sed -i -e /^doc/d .gitignore && npm run minify
scripts.build:npm: npm run create-entry && npm run format
